title: Gold Holds Above $5,000 as US Data Bolsters Case for Rate Cuts
description: Gold rose modestly — consolidating gains above $5,000 an ounce — after weak retail sales in the US supported the case for the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates.
content: Gold rose modestly — consolidating gains above $5,000 an ounce — after weak retail sales in the US supported the case for the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates.
